notes.note: This course can be used to fulfill the social science requirement for HD majors and college credit requirements for other majors in Human Ecology. Enrollment limited to freshmen.
ILRLR 2010 must be taken either prior to or concurrently with enrollment in ILRLR 2050.

notes.note: Permission of instructor and limited to seniors who major in Sociology, Psychology, Human Development and Economics. Capstone seminar for seniors who are interested in graduate study in scientific disciplines that focus on human behavior. Course is designed to mirror the introductory course SOC/HD 1840 Six Pretty Good Books.
